page.title: 19POPULATION
page.content: {Steeple Ashton In a population of some 800 there are 6 doctors, 3 solicitors and a dentist; none practise here. There is a predominance of professional and white collar workers; ll teachers, an architect,3 builders, a plumber and a farrier but only 5 farm employees. The population is mainly 50 plus with a large number of single, widowed and retired people. During the year ending July l985 l3 people died, l born and 4 couples married. {Housing} There are 345 dwellings in Steeple Ashton, Bleet and Ashton Common. In July l985 a bungalow on the Common and one in the Strand are being built. Stables at The Manor are being converted to a house.
